===============================================================================
SecureBlackbox (c) /n software inc.
===============================================================================

SecureBlackbox is the comprehensive suite of software components and classes 
that allows developers to add strong security to their applications to protect 
binary data, files, documents and e-mails in storage and during network 
transfer.

======================
Samples, Help and more
======================

The help file is included in the full installation package, which you can 
download on https://www.secureblackbox.com/download/ . The online version 
of the help file is available on https://www.secureblackbox.com/kb/help

For support options, see https://www.secureblackbox.com/support/

=======
License 
=======

The Evaluation License Key is provided in the LicenseKey.txt file, installed 
with this package.

Your use of SecureBlackbox is governed by the license, available on 
https://www.secureblackbox.com/company/legal/eula/

================
More information
================

SecureBlackbox homepage is https://www.secureblackbox.com/
